titles.title: He Shall Appear As Surely As The Sun Will Shine

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He shall appear as surely as the sun will shine,
As the former and latter rains, on time.
He will come to heal, to revive and to restore.
So come, and let us return unto the Lord,
Let us follow on to know the Lord,
And live in His presence ever more.
